mapper.select: SELECT notice_idx , notice_title , notice_content , date_format(notice_regdate, '%y-%m-%d') as notice_regdate , notice_img , notice_viewcnt , notice_file , notice_filename , notice_status FROM notice WHERE notice_idx=#{noticeIdx}

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM notice
WHERE notice_status=1 and notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%') OR notice_status=1 and notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%')
WHERE notice_status=1

SELECT
(SELECT notice_idx FROM notice WHERE notice_status = 1 AND notice_idx < #{noticeIdx} ORDER BY notice_regDate DESC LIMIT 1) AS prevnum
, (SELECT notice_idx FROM notice WHERE notice_status = 1 AND notice_idx > #{noticeIdx} ORDER BY notice_regDate ASC LIMIT 1) AS nextnum
FROM notice WHERE notice_status = 1 AND notice_idx = #{noticeIdx} ORDER BY notice_regDate DESC
